content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, May 16 (APP):The National Assembly Friday passed as many nine different bills including the Income Tax Ordinance, 2001 [The Income Tax (Amendment) Bill, 2024]. The House also passed the bills included the Federal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education (Amendment) Bill, 2024, The Extradition (Amendment) Bill, 2025], The Pakistan Citizenship (Amendment) Bill, 2024], [The Naturalization (Amendment) Bill, 2024], The Civil Servants (Amendment) Bill, 2025, The Anti-Dumping Duties (Amendment) Bill, 2025],. The Islamabad Capital Territory Child Marriage Restraint Bill, 2024 and the Trade Organization (Amendment) Bill, 2025
